name: Systems integration and commissioning
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description:
The challenges of designing an integrated system, comprising of a number of control systems can lead to unnecessary problems, inefficiencies and waste. Expertise is required to pull the approach together effectively, so the end results are computer systems and software applications controlling physical and functional processes, acting as a co-ordinated whole. This session will cover:

Procurement routes and the impact on commissioning and handover
Integrating systems so these work in harmony (design and installation)
Include mix of office/retail/schools as case studies

presentations.name: Coherent real time data, analytics & control platforms
presentations.speakers: John Stenlake, Chief Technology Officer, Living PlanIT SA

presentations.name: Essential intelligence on approaching a Building System Integration project
presentations.speakers: Matthew Beard, Technical Director, Atkins Global
